Package frc.robot.subsystems

Interface Drivetrain

All Superinterfaces:
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
All Known Implementing Classes:
MecanumDrivetrain, SwerveDrivetrain
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="20250501") public interface Drivetrain extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
This interface represents a holonomic drivetrain Use SwerveDrivetrain instead

      Parameters:
      newPose - The estimated pose
      stdDevs - The measurement error standard deviations [x, y, theta] [meters,meters,radians]
      timestamp - The time at which the pose was detected
